definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: treat violently, wrong (NH id., act violently, treat violently; Aram. [[חֲמַס]] (rare) violently seize; Ar. h.amisa is be hard, strict, rigorous)—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 pl. [[חָֽמְסוּ]] Ez Eze 22:26, Zep 3:4; Impf. [[יַחְמׂס]] Job 15:33, [[וַיַּחְמׂס]] La 2:6; [[תַּחְמָׂסוּ]] Job 21:27, Je 22:3; Pt. [[חׂמֵס]] Pr 8:36; —treat violently, wrong;—

of physical wrong: ´[[תַּחְ]] Je 22:3 (‖[[תּׂנוּ]]) of wrong to widows and orphans; [[כַּגַּן שֻׂבּוֹ]] ´[[וַיַּח]] La 2:6 and hath done violence to his pavilion as to a garden (‖[[שִׁחֵת מׂעֲדוֹ]]); so, fig., of vine, wrong, i.e. fail to nourish, kill [[כַּגֶּפֶן]] ´[[יַח]] [[בִּסְרוֹ]] Job 15:33.
of ethical wrong, obj. [[תּוֹרָה]] Zep 3:4, Ex 22:26 (both ‖[[חִלֵּל קׂדֶשׁ]]); cf. [[מְזִמּוֹת עָלֵי]] [[תַּחְמָׂסוּ]] Job 21:27 the devices (wherewith) ye do me violence.
both physical and ethical [[חׂטְאִי]] [[חׂמֵס נַפְשׁוֹ]] Pr 8:36.

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 pl. [[נֶחְמְסוּ]] Je 13:22 thy heels suffer violence (‖[[נִגְלוּ שׁוּלַיִח]]).
